meanings.sent1: The antiliberals protested against the new liberal laws.
meanings.sent2: Many antiliberals believe in stricter government control.
meanings.sent3: The antiliberals jokingly suggested replacing all books with comic strips.
meanings.sent4: In the political debate, the antiliberals were the dark clouds overshadowing progress.
meanings.sent5: The group of antiliberals stood out with their strong opposition to change.

meanings.definition: Those who are against liberal policies or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The antiliberals voiced their disagreement with the proposed liberal reforms.
meanings.sent2: There was a heated discussion between the liberals and the antiliberals.
meanings.sent3: The antiliberals playfully argued for a ban on ice cream to oppose liberal indulgence.
meanings.sent4: The antiliberals were the thorns in the side of the progressive movement.
meanings.sent5: The antiliberals' resistance to change was unwavering.
